mapper.select: SELECT pv.valueId,pv.userId,pv.paramId,pv.paramValue,p.paramName,p.dataType,pv.paramIntValue,pv.paramDateValue FROM SYS_USER_PARAM pv,SYS_PARAM p WHERE p.paramId=pv.paramId AND pv.userId=#{userId} AND p.status_=1

SELECT UP.VALUEID,UP.USERID,UP.PARAMID,UP.PARAMVALUE,UP.PARAMINTVALUE,UP.PARAMDATEVALUE FROM SYS_USER_PARAM UP INNER JOIN SYS_PARAM SP ON SP.PARAMID = UP.PARAMID WHERE SP.PARAMKEY = #{paramKey} AND UP.PARAMVALUE = #{paramValue}
